name: Massive Minesweeper
description:
GO FULLSCREEN!  AFTER HITTING THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON, CLICK ANYWHERE ELSE IN THE GAME TO ENTER FULLSCREEN!

Tired of being limited in your minesweeper boards?  No more!  Create as big of a board as you want! (Browsers are wack though.  If you plan to play with boards larger than 5000x5000, consider downloading instead)

Includes options to add extra lives, and QOL features such as quick-revealing and quick-flagging. 

I've taken a break from the project but at some point id like to come back and implement the ability to share boards.  I've already got the board editor complete, I just need to implement the ability to play and test it, then share it with others.

The project is also open-source.  Check it out:

https://github.com/ElwoodHogan/CustomMinesweeper

For any bugs or suggestions, feel free to DM them to me at Admiral_Apple#1094
